channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Scottish Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Scottish Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Survation for The Courier, 29–30 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 34.0–40.0%
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 15.7–20.5%
  • Scottish Labour: 16.7–21.6%
  • Scottish Greens: 9.2–13.1%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 6.5–9.9%
  • Alba Party: 2.1–4.3%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Find Out Now for Daily Express, 23–26 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 39.5–45.5%
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 18.8–23.9%
  • Scottish Labour: 14.0–18.5%
  • Scottish Greens: 9.4–13.2%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 3.9–6.6%
  • Reform UK: 1.3–3.1%

item.title: Opinion Poll by BMG Research for Herald Scotland, 16–19 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 39.0–45.1%
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 19.6–24.7%
  • Scottish Labour: 14.9–19.5%
  • Scottish Greens: 6.5–9.9%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 6.5–9.9%
  • Reform UK: 0.5–1.8%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Survation for The Courier, 11–18 March 2021 – Voting Intentions

item.title: Opinion Poll by Savanta ComRes for The Scotsman, 5–10 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

item.description:

  • Scottish Labour: 13.9–18.3%
  • Scottish Greens: 4.7–7.6%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 3.9–6.5%
  • Scottish Socialist Party: 2.1–4.2%
